definition: paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc

sentences.english: But it has exploded in popularity, as this stage is the most vulnerable for the mayfly .
sentences.chinese: 但爆炸的人气，作为现阶段最脆弱的蜉蝣。

sentences.english: Most of modern economic growth theories neglect the contribution of land element.
sentences.chinese: 现阶段土地要素对我国经济增长贡献显著。

sentences.english: In our country, those crossings often use fixed Cyc red and green light.
sentences.chinese: 现阶段，这些路口大多使用周期固定的红绿灯控制器。

sentences.english: Nowadays, in order to save land, underground projects gradually increase.
sentences.chinese: 现阶段，为了节约土地，地下工程逐渐增多。

sentences.english: Family-based support for the aged is a fundamental mode, which presents main stage of rural population in our country.
sentences.chinese: 家庭养老是现阶段我国农村人口养老的主要方式。

sentences.english: Nowadays its keystone is to treat the police with true feelings.
sentences.chinese: 现阶段从优待警的侧重点是以情待警。

sentences.english: We have only been able to produce one roll at this stage.
sentences.chinese: 在现阶段我们只生产出了一卷黄金厕纸。

sentences.english: At this stage the dominant operator products carve coconut palm and activated carbon.
sentences.chinese: 现阶段主要的经营产品为椰棕和活性炭雕。

sentences.english: Answer: At this stage, Static Qigong is not recommended.
The plan does not permit ofany changes at this stage.
sentences.chinese: 计划在现阶段不容许有任何更改。

sentences.english: At present stage, countryside financing has its special characteristic and regional difference.
sentences.chinese: 现阶段，农村融资具有鲜明特点和地域差异。

sentences.english: Nowadays, the coal transportation of the railway generally used the flatcar in China.
sentences.chinese: 我国现阶段，煤在铁路运输中一般都采用敞车运输。

sentences.english: Your period of meditation, reflection, or investigation will soon begin to wind down.
sentences.chinese: 你现阶段的考量，沉思或者是调查会开始尘埃落定。

sentences.english: They also risk straining their relationships with young-adult children intent at this stage on independence.
sentences.chinese: 还会与现阶段打算独立的刚成年的孩子变得关系紧张。

sentences.english: Contracted responsibility system is an effective system at present for invigorating the enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 承包责任制是现阶段搞活企业的有效形式。

sentences.english: It was too early to conclude if there was an asset price bubble.
sentences.chinese: 在现阶段下结论，认为出现资产价格泡沫属言之尚早。
